query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM lojas) as total_lojas,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM lojas WHERE LOWER(nome) LIKE '%teste%' OR LOWER(nome) LIKE '%test%') as lojas_teste,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users) as total_users,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE LOWER(name) LIKE '%teste%' OR LOWER(name) LIKE '%test%') as users_teste,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM gestores) as total_gestores
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2rEtBRZHWZUfGJS.3b07a01772f8 --database 3c9MozLH35e233uWy5WDtH --execute SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM lojas) as total_lojas,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM lojas WHERE LOWER(nome) LIKE '%teste%' OR LOWER(nome) LIKE '%test%') as lojas_teste,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users) as total_users,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE LOWER(name) LIKE '%teste%' OR LOWER(name) LIKE '%test%') as users_teste,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM gestores) as total_gestores
